title: My fps and ping is normal but im lagging very bad
body: * 1. I have a normal fps and ping. I can move around the map freely but i cant cast abilities. Have been reverted to lvl1 and i cant interact with anything. Plus nothings going on.**__**

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing pretty bad packet loss to the server. This often happens as a result of network settings that conflict with League, so I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if that guide resolved your issue or not.
